title: 4k screen even when i scale it down it doesnt work
body: can anyone help me just got a monster laptop but i cant play league on it the screen is just going crazy the whole game anything i can do i tired scaling down the resolution but that didn't work

replies.body:
Hey, if you got a new monster rig you definitely want to make sure it's all up to date.  Run through our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) to make sure your settings and drivers and OS are in good shape.  You may also want to reset your configuration so you can set it up with your new pc in mind.  

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings. 

Grats btw!
